item.description:
Happy St. Patrick’s Day Runners!!

Got Snow Fatigue? Tired of the Recession?

Need a Good Night out and Some Good Carbs????

What better way to celebrate St. Patrick’s Day than to come join us at UNOs Chicago Grill in Porter Square (820 Somerville Ave, Cambridge) on Saturday, March 14th beginning at 5PM-10PM the evening before the Ras na hEireann 5k and New Bedford Half Marathon!!

All runners, friends and families are welcome. We look forward to seeing you there!!

We will give you an Uno’s voucher for your meal and 15% of the proceeds will go towards our charity, Team DLC, a non-profit organization that provides individuals with disabilities access to community services, special education, health care along with many other essential services.

We appreciate your Support and Party Spirit!!!

Charley and Sonya from Informal Running Group
(Running Boston Marathon for Team DLC)


http://www.firstgivin...
item.how_to_find_us: St. Patrick's Day Hats and GREEN!!We will be there at 7pm!!!!!!!!!!!!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Pre St. Patrick's Carb Load, Warning No Running Involved!!!We will be there at 7
